STI.P: Technical specifications for the issuance of qualified electronic attestations of attributes and electronic attestations of attributes issued by or on behalf of a public sector body responsible for an authentic source referred to in Article 3

NP.TXT:
Providers of qualified electronic attestations of attributes and providers of electronic attestation of attributes issued by or on behalf of a public sector body responsible for an authentic source shall issue their attestations in a format according to one of the standards listed in Annex II of Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/2979
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/2979 of 28 November 2024 laying down rules for the application of Regulation (EU) No 910/2014 of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards the integrity and core functionalities of European Digital Identity Wallets (OJ L, 2024/2979, 4.12.2024, ELI: http://data.europa.eu/eli/reg_impl/2024/2979/oj)..

For the issuance of attestations to natural or legal persons, providers of qualified electronic attestation of attributes and providers of electronic attestation of attributes issued by or on behalf of a public sector body responsible for an authentic source shall:
where applicable, verify that the requester of the attestation has the right to act on behalf of the person that is the subject of the attestation;
where applicable, verify the identity of the authentic source used as a source for the attributes included in the attestation;
process only the minimum set of attributes necessary for the issuance and management of the attestation.
In addition, where the attestation is issued to a European Digital Identity Wallet, the attestation provider shall:
verify that the wallet unit is not revoked or suspended.
